name: MonoSpace Prototype
description:
Install instructions

To run the game, download the zip file, extract it, and choose the Windows or optional Linux version.

For the Windows version, extract the folder, click on MonoSpace.exe and play.

For the Linux version, extract the folder, right click on the file MS.x86_64, mark the file as executable (usually in a Permission tab in the properties of the file) and then double click to execute.
